name: Escape (itch) (DiavoloDB)
description:
Indie retro spooky horror game made by a single person (me), as well as my first 3d game, any helpful feedback is welcome :)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[Description]

You wake up in an ancient forgotten cave with only a single flashlight and a will to escape, find all the ancient relics to escape, or die trying.

[How to play]

1 -Download the zip file

2 -Extract game files from the zip file

3 -Ready to play
